briefTitle: Swebcg 91:A RT. Breast Conserving Surgery With or Without Radiotherapy for Breast Cancer Patients
officialTitle: SB (Swedish Breast Cancer Group) 91:A Breast Conserving Surgery With or Without Postoperative Radiotherapy for Breast Cancer Stage 1-2 (<30 mm) pN0, M0
conditions: Breast Cancer Early Stage Breast Cancer (Stage 1-3)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female
* not over the age of 75 years
* operated because of stage 1-2 invasive adenocarcinoma of the breast
* radical excision of the tumour

Exclusion Criteria:

* earlier cancer except cancer in situ of the cervix or skin
* distant metastases
